name: NIGHTCARE
description:
Naptime is over, and you've been left all alone... can you escape the daycare?


NOTES: If you are having trouble moving the chairs make sure that 

  • When pulling towards yourself, you are standing at a distance before pulling
  • When pushing try to give yourself a run up
